Spawn box (small)

i did not have any idea wen i made this. i just made a smal box and made it hollow. and made it spawn, Its really easy made.

********************************
how to change:
just go to the weapons (under the map) and alt+return click it. change the name to whatever u want it to example: weapon_deagle.

********************************
Redzizma
